CFMongoDB API
FRAMES  

Package cfmongodb.components

Class Summary
Collection Represents a Mongo Collection
Database
Document Default implementation of IDocument and used by the Mongo class to generate a document.
ExpressionBuilder
IDocument All MongoDB Documents should implement this interface. Basic ColdFusion structures can also be saved to the datastore. But from an OO design perspective, it's a good practice to implement this interface
MongoConfig Main configuration information for MongoDb connections. Defaults are provided, but should be changed as needed.
MongoDB Facade for Mongo DB. 90% of calls will go through this comonent.
MongoDocument Default implementation of IDocument and used by the Mongo class to generate a document.
